course.subject: LANG
course.name: Communication for Environmental Management and Technology II
course.description: This course aims to develop studentsâ€™ competence in discipline-related English, specifically communicating topics in the field of Environmental Management and Technology to a business audience.  Throughout the course, the importance of communication and persuasion will be examined, and students will learn the necessary skills to be applied in weekly communicative tasks, and individual and group assessments. For EVMT students only.
